system.description:
This skill allows a character to instinctively know the proper actions to take in order to please the Immortals in general. A successful skill check can indicate the appropriate behavior or ritual to use when encountering sacred objects, places, or situations related to the Immortals.

For example, a successful check might reveal that the party should leave an offering at a shrine or avoid disturbing a holy site. This skill also allows a character to recognize symbols and artifacts of the Immortals, as well as to interpret omens or signs given by them.
